channel.title: dna on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in dna on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-23
item.description: Google Voice now lets you decide who goes to voicemail (1 minute read) Google Voice can now be configured to forward calls to a linked phone number or voicemail.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-28
item.description: Celebrating Imgur’s Next Chapter (2 minute read) Imgur has been acquired by MediaLab.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-18
item.description: Amazon built an Alexa cuckoo clock and wants your help backing new projects like this one (2 minute read) Amazon’s ‘Built It’ program is a Kickstarter-like effort where customers can choose to back a product, and if there is enough support within 30 days, Amazon will build it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.
